Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 1.02 MILL PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE DESOTO PARISH COURTHOUSE AND COURTHOUSE ANNEX.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana ("the Parish"), levy a special tax of one and two hundredths (1.02) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $193,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the DeSoto Parish Courthouse and Courthouse Annex?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide -- Communications Dist.- 1.02 Mill - BOC - 10 Yr
Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 1.02 MILL PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING A 911 EMERGENCY TELEPHONE SYSTEM (INCLUDING THE PAYMENT OF NECESSARY PERSONNEL).
Race.FullText: Shall the DeSoto Parish Communications District (the "District") levy a one and two hundredths (1.02) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018 (the "Tax"), (an estimated $237,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating a 911 emergency telephone system (including the payment of necessary personnel)?

Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Grand Cane -- Prop.#1 - 5.18 Mills - Mayor&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1 
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 5.18 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR OPERATING, MAINTAINING AND IMPROVING THE SEWERAGE SYSTEM OF 
THE VILLAGE OF GRAND CANE AND MAINTAINING AND IMPROVING THE PUBLIC STREETS IN SAID VILLAGE. (THE ESTIMATED AMOUNT REASONABLY EXPECTED TO BE COLLECTED FROM THE LEVY OF THE TAX FOR ONE ENTIRE YEAR BEING $4,595.03)
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Grand Cane of the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "Village"), levy a tax of five and eighteen hundredths (5.18) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Village of Grand Cane, an estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $4,595.03, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and improving the sewerage system of the Village and maintaining and improving the public streets in the Village?

Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Grand Cane -- Prop.#2 - 4.81 Mills - Mayor&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 4.81 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR OPERATING, MAINTAINING AND IMPROVING THE SEWERAGE SYSTEM OF
THE VILLAGE OF GRAND CANE. (THE ESTIMATED AMOUNT REASONABLY EXPECTED TO BE COLLECTED FROM THE LEVY OF THE TAX FOR ONE	
ENTIRE YEAR BEING $1,833.25)
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Grand Cane of the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "Village"), levy a tax of four and eighty-one hundredths (4.81) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Village of Grand Cane, an estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $1,833.25, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and improving the sewerage system of the Village?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. 1 -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT 1 PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 5 MILLS TAX CONTINUATION FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING THE DISTRICT'S FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN AND FOR THE DISTRICT AND PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall. Fire Protection District 1 of the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "District") levy a five (5) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $85,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period often (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
